snippet: A federal appeals court reversed the conviction of Joseph Collins, a former outside lawyer to Refco, the collapsed brokerage firm. A retrial could be complicated by the death of a crucial witness, Santo Maggio.
abstract: A federal appeals court reversed the conviction of Joseph Collins, a former outside lawyer to Refco, the collapsed brokerage firm. A retrial could be complicated by the death of a crucial witness, Santo Maggio.

headline.main: Conviction of Former Refco Lawyer Is Overturned
headline.print_headline: Conviction Overturned For an Ex-Refco Lawyer
